questions.question_text: With Cisco ONE, what happens when a customer refreshes hardware?

discussion.content: Straight out of the test prep the answer is D. How did you come up with the answer B?

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

Selected Answer: D
The Answer is D. 
Cisco Certification > Cisco ONE – A New Way to Sell > Cisco ONE Aligns to Customer Needs
Solution is D

choices.D: The customer can refresh hardware in the same tier and port software at no charge, or go to the next tier hardware and just pay the difference for their software.
choices.B: The customer can refresh or go to the next tier of hardware and port or upgrade software at no additional charge.
choices.C: The customer can refresh hardware in the same tier and port software at no charge but must purchase new licenses for the next tier of hardware.
choices.A: The customer must purchase entirely new software licenses.

discussion.content: The answer is B...explixitly stated in the manual

choices.A: Cisco's approach focuses on differentiating itself as a market leader in security solutions from a profits centric perspective.
choices.C: Cisco's approach focuses on increasing revenue and reducing costs from a customer-centric perspective.
choices.B: Cisco's approach focuses on developing a business-focused view of the customer enterprise looking at needs and business outcomes from a customer-centric perspective.
choices.D: Cisco's approach focuses on enabling its sales team with the necessary tools and products to increase its market share.

questions.question_text: Which of these is one-step Cisco is aiming to take to reduce the company's environmental impact by the year 2022?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is the correct answer

Selected Answer: C
correct answer is C
correct answer is C
C is correct answer
right answer is C
A is Wrong answer.. C is correct answer
Cisco is aiming to use electricity generated from renewable sources for at least 85% of the company’s global electricity needs by 2022.

choices.D: Cisco is improving product power consumption and aiming to increase system efficiency to 99 percent.
choices.A: Cisco is aiming to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 15 percent from its global operations.
choices.C: Cisco is aiming to use electricity generated from renewable sources for at least 85 percent of the company's global electricity needs.
choices.B: Cisco is aiming to run at least 35 percent of its global operations exclusively on solar power.

questions.question_text: What three key engines power Cisco DNA Center?

discussion.content:
Correct Answer is A
DNA Center is a new, centralized management dashboard which is used to
translate business goals (intent) into network policy. DNA Center is powered by
three key engines:
Policy control provided by the Identity Service Engine (ISE)
Automation provided by Network Control Platform (NCP)
Analytics provided by the Network Data Platform (NDP)

Selected Answer: A
A is the correct answer

Selected Answer: A
Correct Answer is A
Selling Cisco’s Enterprise and Digital Network Architecture > Digitization and Infrastructure > DNA Center
correct A
right answer is B

choices.A: Identity Service Engine, Network Control Platform, and Network Data Platform
choices.B: Identity Encryption Engine, Network Automation Platform, Network Data Platform
choices.D: Identity Service Engine, Network Automation Platform, Encrypted Traffic Analytics
choices.C: Network Control Platform, Network Automation Platform, Network Encryption Platform
